name: Jeremy and Penelope
description:
This is a video game or visual novel that I created to illustrate to others the struggle of someone dealing with mental health issues, drawing from my own experience to do so. It takes an interesting look by physically personifying the stereotypically good and stereotypically bad sides of the character's emotion and showing the battle they can often have with one another. The main character is literally able to enter this character's head and explore their feelings and conflict because of new emotions and oncoming change.

 It is also written to encourage others and show them that, no matter what, they're not alone.
